text: Ara tomara yakhana striderake talaka da'o ebam tara tadera ‘iddatakala purna kare, erapara tara yadi bidhimata parampara sam'mata haya [1], tabe strira nijedera sbamidera biye karate ca'ile tomara taderake badha di'o na. E dbara take upadesa deya haya [2] tomadera madhye ye allah‌ o akherate imana rakhe, eta'i tomadera jan'ya sud'dhatama o pabitratama [3]. Ara allah‌ janena ebam tomara jana na
